content:
# The stone furnace has successfully smelted 3 copper plates from the 5 copper ore I provided. The furnace is still fueled with 19 units of coal and is currently idle since there are no more copper ore left to process.

# Now, with 3 copper plates in hand, I can proceed to craft the electronic circuits. Each electronic circuit requires:
# - 3 copper cables (which can be crafted from 3 copper plates)
# - 1 iron plate

# I currently have:
# - 3 copper plates
# - 0 iron plates (I need to smelt more iron ore to get iron plates)

# First, I will craft the copper cables from the 3 copper plates I have. 
# Let's proceed to craft the copper cables now.

craft_item(Prototype.CopperCable, quantity=3)  # Craft 3 copper cables from the copper plates.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after crafting.
